00138 //===========================================================================
00160   void initAdpBP(double _eta0 = 0.1) 
00161   { 
00162     deltaw.resize(w.nelem());
00163     eta   .resize(w.nelem());
00164     dedwOld .resize(w.nelem());
00165     v     .resize(w.nelem());
00166     v      = 0.;
00167     eta    = _eta0; 
00168     deltaw = 0; 
00169     dedwOld  = 0; 
00170     eta0   = _eta0;
00171 #ifndef __SOLARIS__
00172     oldE   = std::numeric_limits< double >::max( );
00173 #else
00174     oldE   = MAXDOUBLE;
00175 #endif
00176   }
00177 
00178 
00179 
00180 //===========================================================================
00211   void adpBP(const Array<double> &in,
00212              const Array<double> &out,
00213              double              u     = 1.2,
00214              double              d     = .7,
00215              double              alpha = 0.5)   
00216   {
00217     double newE = derror(in, out);
00218 
00219     if(oldE < newE) w -= deltaw;
00220 
00221     for(unsigned  i = 0; i < w.nelem(); i++) {
00222       if(dedw(i) * dedwOld(i) > 0) eta(i) *= u;
00223       if(dedw(i) * dedwOld(i) < 0) eta(i) *= d;
00224     }
00225 
00226     v = dedw + alpha * v;
00227     deltaw = -eta * v; 
00228 
00229     w += deltaw;
00230 
00231     dedwOld = dedw;
00232     oldE = newE;
00233   }
00234 
00235 
00236 //===========================================================================
00254   void clearMemory() 
00255   { 
00256 #ifndef __SOLARIS__
00257     oldE   = std::numeric_limits< double >::max( );
00258 #else
00259     oldE   = MAXDOUBLE;
00260 #endif
00261     eta = eta0; dedwOld = 0; deltaw = 0;
00262   };
00263 
00264 
00265  protected:
00266 
00269   double eta0;
00270 
00272   double oldE;
00273 
00276   Array<double> deltaw;
00277 
00280   Array<double> v;     
00281 
00283   Array<double> dedwOld;
00284

00288 
00289 };

00370   void initAdpBP(double _eta0 = 0.1) 
00371   {

00374     dedwOld .resize(w.nelem());

00376     v      = 0.;

00380     eta0   = _eta0;
00381 #ifndef __SOLARIS__
00382     oldE   = std::numeric_limits< double >::max( );

00423   void adpBP(const Array<double> &in,
00424              const Array<double> &out,
00425              double              u     = 1.2  ,   // increase factor
00426              double              d     = .7   ,   // decrease factor
00427              double              alpha = 0.5) {   // momentum factor
00428     double newE = derror(in, out);
00429 
00430 
00431     for(unsigned  i = 0; i < w.nelem(); i++) {
00432       if(dedw(i) * dedwOld(i) > 0) eta(i) *= u;
00433       if(dedw(i) * dedwOld(i) < 0) eta(i) *= d;
00434     }
00435 
00436     if((1E-4 + oldE) < newE) {
00437       w -= deltaw;
00438       //deltaw = 0.;
00439       dedwOld  = dedw;
00440     }
00441     else {
00442       v      = dedw + alpha * v;
00443       deltaw = -eta * v; 
00444       dedwOld  = dedw;
00445       oldE   = newE;
00446       w += deltaw;
00447     }
00448   }
00449

00470 #ifndef __SOLARIS__
00471     oldE   = std::numeric_limits< double >::max( );
00472 #else
00473     oldE   = MAXDOUBLE;
00474 #endif
00475   };
